amendment.description: Page 8, line 23, after the dollar amount, insert "(reduced by $10,000,000)". Page 34, line 18, after the dollar amount, insert "(increased by $10,000,000)".
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in Part B of House Report 115-261 to support the reinvigoration of the DOD Cyber Scholarship Program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Langevin amendment Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Langevin amendment Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A047) offered by Mr. Langevin.
